description: Hino Akiharu lost his parents when he was small and was adopted into his uncle's family. He didn't want to be a burden on his uncle's family and decides to enter a free boarding school as a butler, Hakureiryou high school. However, his delinquent boy-like appearance frightens the girls, who make up the majority of the students. Unable to get along with the classmates, Akiharu meets his childhood crush Saikyou Tomomi.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Butler
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a butler.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Cosplay
tags.description: Features dressing up as a different character or profession.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

Akio Takami is an animator, animation supervisor and character designer. Originally a member of Ashi Productions, he joined Xebec in the 90s, where he participated in most of Xebec's works and became one of the key people at the studio.

Akio Takami is an animator, animation supervisor and character designer. Originally a member of Ashi Productions, he joined Xebec in the 90s, where he participated in most of Xebec's works and became one of the key people at the studio.
Founder of MediaBlasters. Previously affiliated with Central Park Media.
